projects.description:
The main task for this case study was to analyze and develop insights and client-focused recommendations related to these following subjects:
• Developing new competencies for the client
• Managing the new product category
• Choosing the right partner in retailing
• Developing a consistent Marketing and Sales strategy

The team achieved the second place at the Italian National Competition.

projects.title: UNIS Shadowing Programme
projects.description: On the occasion of the United Nations Day, the United Nations Information Service (UNIS) in Vienna organized for the second time a special programme for university students called the 'Shadowing programme'​. From Hungary 5 students had the opportunity to accompany a United Nations staff member for one day and to experience what it is really like to work for the United Nations organizations in Vienna. The 'Shadowing Programme' took place in the Vienna International Centre (VIC) from 16 October until 31 October 2013.

projects.title: Alfa Romeo-Path to premium
projects.description: We analyzed young customers (18-23 years old) in order to understand their priorities, their attitude towards cars, their driving habits and the means of transportation they mainly use. projects.title: L'Oréal Brandstorm - Strategy for the Lancôme brand in the travel retail channel
projects.description: Developing a Marketing Plan for Lancôme within the travel retail sector by considering the global shopper perspective, analyzing the market, the channel and the brand, and defining what are the opportunities for the brand in this channel. Our team also developed a new retail experience for Lancôme’s Travel Retail shops to attract and loyalize new customers.

projects.title: Philips - Citiscape Headphones
projects.description:
Qualitative Research Project that investigates the emotional drivers behind the consumption of music through headphones, focusing our target group: Urbanities (consumers aged 18-24). 
Research insights were collected through the conduction of a Focus Group and In-Depth interviews.
Final presentation of the findings and the managerial implications to the marketing managers of the headphones business.

projects.title: Prénatal Business Case - Retail and Channel Marketing Project
projects.description:
• Analysis of the brand, the company's product lines, marketing, distribution, and  communication strategies
• Designing a competitive analysis to evaluate the price positioning and quality of clients portfolio of each competitor
• Designing a new multi-channel, multi-brand strategy (instead of the single channel, mono-brand strategy that was implemented by the company previously)
• This strategy included decisions regarding the assortment, in-store space management, in-store services, store location, shopping experience, personnel, and supply chain management 
• Analysis of potential opportunities and risks of the new channel implementation

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the High End Electric toothbrush propositions (Sonicare Diamond Clean Smart and Prestige 9900) and for developing and launching new breakthrough innovations.
profile_positions.title: Senior Global Consumer Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description: Globally responsible for Philips Avent Infant Feeding and Toddler Drinking category (leading a team of 6), with focus on global portfolio strategy definition, mid-long term innovation roadmap (incl. new business models), Innovation-to-Market program, development and launch of ground-breaking innovations, P&L financial performances management.
profile_positions.title: Consumer Marketing Director a.i.

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities: Portfolio management for the Infant Feeding portfolio
In charge of financial and competitive performance of product range | Strategy creation and execution | Product development | Pricing strategy | Performance in terms of ratings and reviews | SKU & stock management and cost down activities 

Main activities include:
- Support Infant Feeding Roadmap creation (including claims roadmap)
- Leading new product development projects including VPC, AD, PDLM
- Core part of Integral Value Proposition project within Mother & Child Care
- Owner of strategic portfolio business case for the Infant Feeding category to support Roadmap decisions
- Market potential assessment and business case development for cost/revenue analyses
- Supporting consumer research and home placement test for identification for new product development 
- Cooperation with the Clinical Marketing team in order to secure communications towards healthcare professionals

Results:
- Roadmap created for Infant Feeding category 
- Strategic portfolio business case approved ensuring NPI global launch plan and roll-out 
- Completed multi-phased consumer research in China to identify potential of new product concept and closed related Value Proposition Creation project
profile_positions.title: Senior Global Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
Main activities include:
- Leading new product development projects including VPC, AD, PDLM
- Market potential assessment and business case development for cost/revenue analyses
- Establishing timelines with various functions including production and supply chain
- Responsible for creation and coordination of the global market activation plans and go-to-market strategy for new products launches
- Supporting consumer research and home placement test for identification for new product development 
- Market competition assessment and product benchmarking

Results:
- Led a strategic End-to-End project with the North American market, leading to the launch of a new to the world proposition including 90+ new SKUs globally. The launch helped in reverting the declining trend of the range, and was brought to life in a record timeline (highlights: +18% sales increase in NAM after YoY decline, and significant market share gains in both NAM and DACH)
- Led the repositioning of an entire product range globally (200+ SKUs)
profile_positions.title: Global Consumer Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities: 
Category management support and Market introduction planning for the Infant feeding product ranges | Supported new product launches from commercial side including marketing and communication activities | Prepared business case and cost/revenue analyses | Established time schedules with production and supply chain | Consumer insight research for identification for new product development | Portfolio management support and interaction with various disciplines including manufacturing units, R&D, Legal and Regulatory department, internal and external design agencies and local markets | Market competition assessment and product benchmarking	

Results:
- From the commercial side led the complete re-branding of the Anti-colic portfolio in N-America
- Leading numerous life-cycle management projects including line-extensions, set-up production from new factory location and localization of the products, and launching new to local markets products
profile_positions.title: Jr. Global Consumer Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description: Results: Managed 33 life-cycle management projects globally: Coordinated 17 line-extensions, and 16 new to local markets products | Successfully responded and implemented 10 product modifications due to changes in legal and regulatory requirements

profile_positions.title: Middle Manager at Incoming Exchanges, LC Pécs

company.name: Simonyi Business and Economic Development Center (Simonyi BEDC)

profile_positions.description: The Simonyi Center in Pécs, Hungary facilitates the transformation of Hungarian and Eastern European economies from a post-socialist to a western capitalist approach. We worked togeher with students attending Ohio University and with our professors. We had the opportunity to help local small and medium-sized companies by elaborating detailed business plans and offering innovative ideas. The projects were concurrent and required intensive research on the industry, market and competition. The final deliverable included marketing segmentation analysis, structured business plans, financial projections, etc.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

volunteer_experiences.role: Organizer of a Christmas gift-giving event for children living in a financial disadvantage

company.name: Hungarian Red Cross of Baranya County

volunteer_experiences.description: Organizing a Christmas gift-giving event for the children in need in order to make their Christmas more joyful and better. This is a way to give back to the society, thus we invited our Faculty to gather gifts for these children, and then we had the opportunity to give the gifts personally to them.

company.name: Hungarian Red Cross of Baranya County

volunteer_experiences.description: Promoting and organizing a blood donation event at the Faculty in order to increase awareness among youth, help people with bad medical condition and to save lives of those in need.

company.name: Janus Pannonius College for Advanced Economic Studies

volunteer_experiences.description: With the members of Janus Pannonius College for Advanced Economic Studies we went to a local children's hospital  to paint and decorate the patient rooms in order to create a more pleasant stay, and a sense of home for children in hospitals.

Misina Animal Shelter is an organization that tries to ameliorate the life of the abandoned animals; these animals would be otherwise out on their own. My volunteer activities included animal feeding and dog walking (there are many dogs in the shelter in cages all day long, and their opportunity to walk is mostly when volunteers visit the animal shelter for this purpose) and taking care of different animals. These animals require care, but unfortunately the workers cannot provide this care for all of these animals by themselves, so they definitely need volunteers. Also, I helped them in a fund-raising event  in order to support the good work at the shelter.

volunteer_experiences.role: Volunteer at Szentendre Open Air Museum

company.name: GE Foundation and International Institute of Education

volunteer_experiences.description: The aim of Szentendre Open Air Museum is to present folk architecture, interior decoration, farming and way of life in the Hungarian language area from the 2nd half of the 18th century to the 1st half of the 20th century, through original and authentic objects, relocated houses arranged in old settlement patters. With the Scholar-Leaders, we visited the Museum in order to help the maintenance of the outside area by planting a garden and by performing other gardening tasks.
